titleStmt.title: The mighty wonders of a merciful providence in a sermon preached on January 31, 1688/9, being the day of publick thanksgiving to God for the great deliverance of this kingdom by His Highness the Prince of Orange / by T. Cruso.
titleStmt.author: Cruso, Timothy, 1656?-1697.
